author: GameSpot
description:
Guten tag! Opening Night Live at Gamescom 2025 just wrapped, and we saw so many new games! From Zhong Kui to Resident Evil Requiem to Ghost of Yotei, ONL brought out some heavy hitters! And here is your chance to watch a "shortened" version of ONL, taking the best parts from the show and trimming it from the original runtime of 2 hours down to 52 minutes.

title: Opening Night Live 2025 in 52 Minutes | Gamescom 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Take a look at this new gameplay trailer for Resident Evil Requiem revealed at Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025. 

Grace and Alyssa Ashcroft make their way through a building with no power unaware of what evils may lie within this particular residence.

Requiem for the dead. Nightmare for the living.

Resident Evil Requiem is the ninth title in the mainline Resident Evil series.

Prepare to escape death in a heart-stopping experience that will chill you to your core.

Technological advancements combined with the development team's depth of experience combine in a story with rich characters and gameplay that's more immersive than ever before.
title: Resident Evil Requiem (RE9) - Official Gamescom Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 will be released on October 21, 2025. 

The action-RPG video game is the sequel to the cult classic Vampire: The Masquerade-Bloodlines. Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 lets players step into its story through two distinct, alternating perspectives: Elder vampire Phyre and Malkavian detective Fabien.

After centuries in torpor, Phyre wakes in modern-day Seattle with a strange mark that seals away their Elder powers. In the quiet of their mind, Fabien’s voice stirs. As Phyre, you will navigate the city’s web of Kindred politics, meet its rulers, uncover hidden agendas, and explore Seattle’s darkest secrets to reclaim the power that was once yours.

When daylight forces Phyre to rest, the dreams bring visions of Fabien’s past. You awaken as Fabien in a 1920s Seattle, determined to solve the mystery of your own murder. Fabien’s Malkavian blood gives him unsettling insights but also fractures his perception of reality, blurring the line between
title: Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 | Official Release Date Reveal Gameplay Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
Presenting SILENT HILL f Story Trailer!
Find the beauty in terror in this new Japanese psychological horror.

When Hinako Shimizu's secluded town of Ebisugaoka is consumed by a sudden fog, her once-familiar home becomes a haunting nightmare. As the town falls silent and the fog thickens, Hinako must navigate the twisted paths of Ebisugaoka, solving complex puzzles and confronting grotesque monsters to survive. Immerse yourself into Hinako's world as imagined by renowned author Ryukishi07, with entrancing soundscapes by Akira Yamaoka and beautiful visuals in a gripping tale of doubt, regret, and inescapable choices.

Will Hinako embrace the beauty hidden within terror, or succumb to the madness that lies ahead? Discover a new chapter in the SILENT HILL series, blending psychological horror with a haunting Japanese setting.

#ps5 #ps5games #gamescom 

Rated Mature
title: Silent Hill f - Official Story Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
WHERE SHADOWS FALL, LEGENDS RISE. 

The definitive ninja action-adventure franchise returns with NINJA GAIDEN 4! Embark on a cutting-edge adventure where legacy meets innovation in a high-octane blend of style and no-holds-barred combat.
title: NINJA GAIDEN 4 - Official Story Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
The upcoming swordplay action game from Capcom, Onimusha: Way of the Sword, has a brand new trailer: The Genma Experiments.

Take a peek at these twisted scenes where the Genma are cooking something special just for Musashi.

Stay tuned for more details on these formidable macabre enemies like Dokyo and the new Genma introduced in this trailer.

Coming to PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, Steam in 2026!


*Footage represents a game that is still in development.
title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword - The Genma Experiments Gameplay Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
At last, back to war! Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War IV officially revealed during Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025!

Battle for planet Kronus as Warhammer 40,000's ultimate real time strategy game returns, featuring the largest campaign ever with four distinct factions battling it out in epic, brutal large-scale conflicts. 

Dawn of War IV returns to the legendary RTS series’ roots with satisfying gameplay and a brutal, expanded Sync Kill system. Take command of four Warhammer 40,000 factions, including, for the first time in the Dawn of War series, the Adeptus Mechanicus! Fight through 70+ campaign missions solo or with a friend in a story crafted by legendary Black Library author John French. Immerse yourself in endlessly replayable modes including Last Stand and Skirmish, or take the fight to the world with intense multiplayer combat.
title: Warhammer 40k: Dawn of War 4 - Official Cinematic Announcement Trailer

author: GameSpot
description: Call of Duty®: Black Ops 7 redefines the franchise with a reality-shattering Co-Op Campaign, adrenaline-fueled Multiplayer across 18 launch maps, and the chilling return of Round-Based Zombies. Embrace the madness and experience the most mind-bending Black Ops yet.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 | Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
This one is special, Helldivers. Our first Legendary Warbond is here! Step into the boots of the Obedient Democracy Support Troopers (ODSTs) and prepare to make history. 

The HELLDIVERS 2 x HALO: ODST Legendary Warbond is filled with Halo: ODST-inspired weapons, armor, patterns, and more!

#ps5 #ps5games #pcgames #helldivers2 #haloodst #gamescom
title: Helldivers 2 x Halo: ODST - Legendary Warbond Gameplay Reveal Trailer
